# Concept Questions


## Question 1

:::{.poll}
Which elements have been applied to the following plot?
:::

\

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig-align: center

arbuthnot %>%
    mutate(p_girls = girls / (girls + boys)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = year,
               y = p_girls)) +
    geom_line(color = "steelblue") +
    labs(x = "Year",
         y = "Proportion girls") +
    ylim(0, 1) +
    theme_bw(base_size = 24) +
    annotate("segment", 
             x = 1629, xend = 1710,
             y = .5, yend = .5,
             color = "dark green", lty = 2)
```
